devel.commit_message:
Fix emphasis tests with multiple underscores wrongly converted

When underscores are used inside words, they must not be converted to
elements. This change fixes the case where multiple underscores are
used, e.g. `this___isa___test`.
Add tests for links with multiple underscores

Convert line break in header to
when converting to kramdown
Shaky attempt to add the HTML5 entities
Make Ruby 2.5 the minimum version supported

Fix loading of config file with recent Rubies (Psych 4.0)

Using Ruby 3.2, the following command would fail like this without the fix:

    > bin\kramdown --config-file .kramdown.yml -i GFM -o html README.md
    .../ruby-3.2-lean/lib/ruby/3.2.0/psych.rb:322:in `safe_load': wrong number of arguments (given 2, expected 1) (ArgumentError)
        from .../vendor/ruby/3.2.0/gems/kramdown-2.4.0/bin/kramdown:114:in `<top (required)>'
        from .../bin/kramdown.cmd:30:in `load'
        from .../bin/kramdown.cmd:30:in `<main>'

Update tests for role doc-noteref element change

Only consists of moving role="doc-noteref" from the `sup` element to the
`a` element in the test cases.

Fix role="doc-noteref" per WAI-ARIA requirements.

Fixes #719. PR #693 also incorporate this fix, but has gone stale.
Adding the emphasis character to the options for the element to make it easier to support underlines.
Define the list_indent option to make it generally usable
Update version, release notes and homepage

kramdown converter: Add list_indent option

Some markdown dialects need to have nested lists indented by 4 spaces.
The kramdown converter writes the 2 spaces needed by kramdown.
The option list_indent allows setting this to 4 so that other markdown
readers can use the output.
Fix setting highlighter class for code spans in HTML converter
Fix escaping of colon for conversion to kramdown

master.commit_message: Define the list_indent option to make it generally usable
Update version, release notes and homepage

kramdown converter: Add list_indent option

Some markdown dialects need to have nested lists indented by 4 spaces.
The kramdown converter writes the 2 spaces needed by kramdown.
The option list_indent allows setting this to 4 so that other markdown
readers can use the output.
Fix setting highlighter class for code spans in HTML converter
Fix escaping of colon for conversion to kramdown
